I possessed the wife of the hero of the novel. Well, so to be precise, as a villainous supporting character and extravagant wife who died at the hands of the hero. 
 
But if I treat him nicely from when he was young, wouldn’t he divorce me nicely later?
 
**
 
“Divorce…?”
 
“His Majesty seems to want you to marry the Duchess of Lancaster, and The Empress….She wants it too…I’m just going to be someone in your path, and I just can’t help myself.”
 
“So if I give you a divorce, you will run to Noah and cajole him?” 
 
“What?”
 
“Don’t be ridiculous. I didn’t struggle on the battlefield for my wife and brother to fool around. I’m sure you had fun while I was away.”
 
Why did his brother’s name come up?
